Name: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
Sahrawi Arab Democratic Republic
Capital: El Aaiún (official) Tifariti (factual temporary, seat of government) and Sahrawi refugee camps (some government and military facilities)

Name: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha
Capital: Jamestown (Saint Helena) Georgetown (Ascension Island) Edinburgh of the Seven Seas (Tristan da Cunha)

Name: Tanzania
Capital: Dodoma (official) Dar es Salaam (seat of government)

Name: Tokelau
Capital: Nukunonu (main settlement, although each atoll has its own administrative centre)
